byline.contributor: With Jed Lipinski, Evan S. Schwartz and Kate Taylor.

abstract: Sarah Masllin Nir Nocturnalist column on Esquire magazine party for Natural Resources Defense Council, held at the ClockTower Building in Dumbo section of Brooklyn.
snippet: A Wednesday party was unusually bereft of celebrities. Denise Rich classed up for a Monday ball. A show at the public library had many Barbies but few Kens.
lead_paragraph: A Wednesday party was unusually bereft of celebrities. Denise Rich classed up for a Monday ball. A show at the public library had many Barbies but few Kens.

headline.main: Missing Several Stars, and Also One Juror
headline.print_headline: Missing Several Stars, And Also One Juror
headline.seo: Celebrities in Short Supply at Esquire Party in ClockTower - Nocturnalist
